member.name: M:Polaris.Extensions.CommandExtensions.TryExecute(System.Windows.Input.ICommand,System.Object)
member.summary: Tries to execute the command. The command won't be executed if it's null or if the CanExecution function returns null

member.name: M:Polaris.Extensions.NumericExtensions.Clamp``1(``0,``0,``0)
member.summary: Limits the value to the specified range as long as the type is IComparable.
